definition: to load or unload/to transfer/to assemble and disassemble
adornment/to adorn/dress/clothing/costume (of an actor in a play)/to play a role/to pretend/to install/to fix/to wrap (sth in a bag)/to load/to pack
to unload/to unhitch/to remove or strip/to get rid of

sentences.english: Forklift truck is very convenient equipment for loading and unloading goods.
sentences.chinese: 叉車是裝卸貨物時的一種非常方便的裝置。

sentences.english: Forklift vehicle used to transport heavy exhibit materials short distance and for loading and unloading materials.
sentences.chinese: 剷車，主要用於重量大展品裝卸和短距離移動。

sentences.english: Loading and unloading inbound and outbound means of transport may be subject to supervision and control of the Customs.
sentences.chinese: 海關可以對進出境運輸工具裝卸貨物實施監裝監卸。

sentences.english: The damage was caused by rough handling when the goods were loaded on board ship at the dock.
sentences.chinese: 貨物損壞是在碼頭搬運裝船時因野蠻裝卸所造成的。

sentences.english: The plane was assembled in a hangar next to the airport.
sentences.chinese: 飛機在機場附近的機庫裏裝卸貨物。

sentences.english: The accident was caused by rough handling at the port.
sentences.chinese: 事故是由於在港口野蠻裝卸造成的。

sentences.english: When handling loads with cranes or trucks, caution crew members to stand clear of any overhead loads and boom.
sentences.chinese: 用吊車或卡車裝卸貨物時，貨物和起重臂下不許站人。

sentences.english: The boy liked to watch the boats being loaded and unloaded.
sentences.chinese: 這男孩愛看輪船裝卸貨物。

sentences.english: General cargo is loaded and unloaded by cranes or ship's own derricks .
sentences.chinese: 純貨用訖重機或用船舶大家的吊杆裝卸。

sentences.english: We had thought the damage may be caused by the rough handling of the shipping company.
sentences.chinese: 我們原以爲受損可能是因船公司的野蠻裝卸造成的。

sentences.english: Specialized production Plywood the Panel mechanical equipment, material handling machine belt.
sentences.chinese: 專門生產竹膠板的人造板機械設備，帶裝卸料機。

sentences.english: The stochastic loader problem and the procedure for solutions were proposed in this paper.
sentences.chinese: 提出了隨機裝卸工問題及其求解策略。

sentences.english: The survey has revealed that the damage to the goods is attributable to rough handling.
sentences.chinese: 商檢表明貨物的受損是由於野蠻裝卸所引起的。

sentences.english: We have two portainers on the wharf.
sentences.chinese: 碼頭上我們有兩架裝卸橋。

sentences.english: The child often watches the ships being loaded and unloaded.
sentences.chinese: 那個孩子經常看船隻裝卸貨物。
